overview: After her husband's death, Nahed decides to marry Galal, whom he loved before her first marriage. The couple decides to spend their vacation in Alexandria. To Nahed, who denies it at the beginning, but when Jalal approached the matter about these doubts, he does not deny it, threatening to kill him if he leaves him, seizing the opportunity at the first moment when he can escape.
title: ومن الحب ماقتل
